availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James D. Jones (Boyd County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, attorney and notary public. Kentucky native. Son of Elizabeth A. Jones. Attorney in Catlettsburg, Kentucky, in 1860. Confirmed as a notary public in Boyd County on February 5, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 109.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 102A-B.
KYR-0001-017-0062.
